channel.title: The Academy of Eon
channel.description: Discussion on a range of topics centric to Eon strategy, tactics, and gameplay technique.

item.title: The Academy of Eon
item.author: invalid@example.com (Samurai)
item.dc:creator: Samurai
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to the Academy of Eon.

This forum is designed to allow players to discuss battlefield strategy, gameplay technique, and tactics. Anything from tips and tricks to full on articles and essays are more than welcome here.
